About

This is what I am all about.

Khaled Zaky

Technical Product Manager|Software Engineer|TechGeek

An innovative and self-motivated individual passionate about technology and software. Khaled's unique skills and think-outside-the-box approach play a significant role in his ability to bridge the gap between technology and businesses. Khaled possesses strong written and oral communication skills while maintaining a diverse and multi-disciplinary approach. His strongest skillset is working well with customers and understanding the problems the product is intended to solve. Khaled managed an entire set of technical products for the biggest telecommunications provider in Canada. He has a strong ability to articulate the product vision from the highest levels of executive leadership to development and implementation teams. He has a track record of successful leadership roles at McMaster University and several community organizations. Khaled has a great ability motivate his peers to achieve favorable results for complex initiatives. He holds a Bachelor's of Software Engineering from McMaster University and a current member of the Professional Engineers of Ontario.
